title: Rainy night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city street with multiple parked cars and a pedestrian crossing.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It slows down or brakes when approaching parked cars or pedestrians crossing the street. The driver is cautious and attentive to the surroundings to avoid any accidents.
